post.summary: Login user and receive JWT token.
post.description:
This endpoint allows users to login to sero server. The TTL for token is set by
the owner of the server by `JWT_TTL` env.

400.description: Bad request or bad credentials. See details.

500.description: Some error occurred on the server.

post.summary: Register new user for sero server.
post.description:
This endpoint creates new user for sero server. The amount of users is checked
by [RegistrationGuard]. The amount of allowed users is determined by `MAX_USERS` env.

400.description: Bad request or bad credentials. See details.

500.description: Some error occurred on the server.

tags: Origins Management and Dynamic Access Control
get.summary: List all origins for specified subdomain for dynamic CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) management.
get.description:
This endpoint allows users to list all origins that are permitted to access resources
on their specified subdomains. The action is authenticated using a JWT, and the subdomain must
be owned by the user making the request. This will be checked by the server.

parameters.name: x-subdomain
parameters.description: 'x-subdomain' header represents the name of the subdomain on which the action is to be performed.

201.description: Origins were successfully retrieved for subdomain.

400.description: The 'x-subdomain' header is missing or contains invalid characters.

401.description: Unauthorized: The JWT in the header is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden: The subdomain is owned by another user.

404.description: Not Found: The login or subdomain was not found. See details for more information.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error occurred on the server.

tags: Origins Management and Dynamic Access Control
post.summary: Adds a new origin to a specified subdomain for dynamic CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) management.
post.description:
This endpoint allows users to add origins that are permitted to access resources
on their specified subdomains. The action is authenticated using a JWT, and the subdomain must
be owned by the user making the request. This will be checked by the server.

parameters.name: x-subdomain
parameters.description: 'x-subdomain' header represents the name of the subdomain on which the action is to be performed.

400.description: The 'x-subdomain' header is missing or contains invalid characters.

401.description: Unauthorized: The JWT in the header is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden: The subdomain is owned by another user.

404.description: Not Found: The login or subdomain was not found. See details for more information.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error occurred on the server.

tags: Origins Management and Dynamic Access Control
delete.summary: Delete all origins for specified subdomain for dynamic CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) management.
delete.description:
This endpoint allows users to delete all origins that are permitted to access resources
on their specified subdomains. The action is authenticated using a JWT, and the subdomain must
be owned by the user making the request. This will be checked by the server.

parameters.name: x-subdomain
parameters.description: 'x-subdomain' header represents the name of the subdomain on which the action is to be performed.

204.description: Origins were successfully deleted for subdomain.

400.description: The 'x-subdomain' header is missing or contains invalid characters.

401.description: Unauthorized: The JWT in the header is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden: The subdomain is owned by another user.

404.description: Not Found: The login or subdomain was not found. See details for more information.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error occurred on the server.

tags: Origins Management and Dynamic Access Control
get.summary: Get specified origin [by id] for specified subdomain for dynamic CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) management.
get.description:
This endpoint allows users to get specified origin by id that is permitted to access resources
on specified subdomain. The action is authenticated using a JWT, and the subdomain must
be owned by the user making the request. This will be checked by the server.

parameters.name: x-subdomain
parameters.description: 'x-subdomain' header represents the name of the subdomain on which the action is to be performed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the origin to retrieve

400.description: The 'x-subdomain' header is missing or contains invalid characters.

401.description: Unauthorized: The JWT in the header is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden: The subdomain is owned by another user.

404.description: Not Found: The login or subdomain or origin was not found. See details for more information.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error occurred on the server.

tags: Origins Management and Dynamic Access Control
delete.summary: Delete origin by id for specified subdomain for dynamic CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) management.
delete.description:
This endpoint allows users to delete origin by id that is permitted to access resources
on their specified subdomains. The action is authenticated using a JWT, and the subdomain must
be owned by the user making the request. This will be checked by the server.

parameters.name: x-subdomain
parameters.description: 'x-subdomain' header represents the name of the subdomain on which the action is to be performed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the origin to delete

204.description: Origin was successfully deleted for subdomain.

400.description: The 'x-subdomain' header is missing or contains invalid characters.

401.description: Unauthorized: The JWT in the header is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden: The origin is owned by another user.

404.description: Not Found: The login or subdomain or origin was not found. See details for more information.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error occurred on the server.

get.summary: Download site of the specified subdomain.
get.description: Returns a zip file which was uploaded by user (last)

parameters.name: x-subdomain
parameters.description: x-subdomain header represents name of subdomain to call action on

400.description: The 'x-subdomain' header is missing or contains invalid characters.

401.description: Unauthorized: The JWT in the header is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden: The subdomain is owned by another user.

404.description: Not Found: The login or subdomain was not found. See details for more information.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error occurred on the server.

post.summary: Uploads site for a specified subdomain.
post.description:
Warning: Old files will be removed after successful upload.
The cleanup task is configured with `CLEAN_OBSOLETE_INTERVAL` env
If upload fails then old files will be preserved.
If upload fails on th stage of extracting zips then
new subdomain will be associated with user

Upload guard checks amount of uploads available for user.
The guard is configured with `MAX_SITES_PER_USER` env.

parameters.name: x-subdomain
parameters.description: x-subdomain header represents name of subdomain to call action on

400.description: The 'x-subdomain' header is missing or contains invalid characters.

401.description: Unauthorized: The JWT in the header is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden: The subdomain is owned by another user.

404.description: Not Found: The login or subdomain was not found. See details for more information.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error occurred on the server.

delete.summary: Removes a specific site identified by the `x-subdomain` header.
delete.description:
This endpoint allows authenticated users to remove a site associated with the specified subdomain.
The subdomain to be removed is specified in the `x-subdomain` header.

parameters.name: x-subdomain
parameters.description: x-subdomain header represents name of subdomain to call action on

400.description: The 'x-subdomain' header is missing or contains invalid characters.

401.description: Unauthorized: The JWT in the header is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden: The subdomain is owned by another user.

404.description: Not Found: The login or subdomain was not found. See details for more information.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error occurred on the server.

patch.summary: Disables a specific site identified by the `x-subdomain` header.
patch.description: This endpoint allows authenticated users to disable a site associated with the specified subdomain.

parameters.name: x-subdomain
parameters.description: x-subdomain header represents name of subdomain to call action on

400.description: The 'x-subdomain' header is missing or contains invalid characters.

401.description: Unauthorized: The JWT in the header is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden: The subdomain is owned by another user.

404.description: Not Found: The login or subdomain was not found. See details for more information.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error occurred on the server.

patch.summary: Enables a specific site identified by the `x-subdomain` header.
patch.description: This endpoint allows authenticated users to enable a site associated with the specified subdomain.

parameters.name: x-subdomain
parameters.description: x-subdomain header represents name of subdomain to call action on

400.description: The 'x-subdomain' header is missing or contains invalid characters.

401.description: Unauthorized: The JWT in the header is invalid or expired.

403.description: Forbidden: The subdomain is owned by another user.

404.description: Not Found: The login or subdomain was not found. See details for more information.

500.description: Internal Server Error: An error occurred on the server.

id.description:
Automatically generated id for new origin
This can be used for further management

origin.description:
This duplicates origin from response payload
to match REST specification

Details.description:
This struct is a response of server in bad situation
That can be INTERNAL SERVER ERROR or BAD REQUEST
You can find all information in reason field

reason.description: This field will contain error information

login.description:
The username used for authentication.
It must adhere to the following criteria:
- It can contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and periods (.).
- It cannot contain any of the following characters: & =  ' - + , < >
- It cannot have multiple periods (.) consecutively.
- Minimum length of 5 characters.
- Maximum length of 40 characters.

password.description:
The password used for authentication.
It must meet the following requirements:
- Minimum length of 12 characters.
- Maximum length of 40 characters.
- A combination of letters, numbers, and symbols.

LoginResponse.description: The JWT token generated for authentication purposes.

login.description:
The username used for authentication.
It must adhere to the following criteria:
- It can contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), and periods (.).
- It cannot contain any of the following characters: & =  ' - + , < >
- It cannot have multiple periods (.) consecutively.
- Minimum length of 5 characters.
- Maximum length of 40 characters.

password.description:
The password used for authentication.
It must meet the following requirements:
- Minimum length of 12 characters.
- Maximum length of 40 characters.
- A combination of letters, numbers, and symbols.

id.description: Auto generated id of a registered user
